version_description:
Global Launch of Renegade Racing!
- New Volcanic themed world "Devil's Island"
- Added Power-ups! Unlock and use over 16 different power-ups to give yourself that vital edge in races!
- Multiplayer enhancements
- Other performance improvements
This update includes a redesign of the Shop as well as minor bug fixes and performance improvements.
This update introduces some minor bug fixes and performance optimisations

Race your way to victory in this brand new update!
- Speed through a new themed world "Green Hills"
- Unlock and upgrade two new cars: "Time Machine" and "Legendary"
- General fixes and improvements
- Improved performance and loading times

Race your way to victory in this brand new update!
- Speed through a new themed world "Green Hills"
- 4 new vehicles to unlock and upgrade, including "Time Machine" and "Legendary"
- New Avatar system! Show off your favorite avatar in multiplayer!
- General fixes and improvements
- Improved performance and loading times

Race your way to victory in this brand new update!
- Speed through a new themed world "Green Hills"
- 4 new vehicles to unlock and upgrade, including "Time Machine" and "Legendary"
- New Avatar system! Show off your favorite avatar in multiplayer!
- General fixes and improvements
- Improved performance and loading times
